name: @wajeht/capdb
description: database management cli for docker environments

scripts.cli: npm unlink capdb && chmod +x ./src/index.js && npm link && rm -f ./src/database/db.sqlite && npm run migrate:latest
scripts.postinstall: rm -f ./src/database/db.sqlite && touch ./src/database/db.sqlite && chmod +w ./src/database/db.sqlite && chmod +x ./src/scripts/start.sh && npm run migrate:latest
scripts.setup: if ! command -v pm2 &> /dev/null; then echo 'Installing PM2...'; npm install pm2 -g; fi
scripts.clean: if pm2 show capdb &> /dev/null; then echo 'Stopping and deleting existing capdb...'; pm2 stop capdb; pm2 delete capdb; fi
scripts.start-pm2: npm run clean && npm run install-deps && pm2 start ./src/commands/start.js --name capdb && pm2 startup && pm2 save --force
scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run start-pm2
scripts.backup: echo '' && echo 'backup scheduler has been started' && echo '' && exit 0

author: @wajeht
